text:
Fans were desperately waiting to see Nick Jonas dance on desi tunes, weren't we? Giving us a glimpse into the Sangeet ceremony, Priyanka Chopra finally treated fans with the pictures. Here's all that went inside the Umaid Bhawan!
In a typical desi style, a song and dance competition was held between the two families. All the guests and family members were dressed up in desi attires. With each song, they told a story, much like Hum Saath Saath Hain maybe?! Who won and who was the judge, well that hasn't been revealed.
Priyanka Chopra danced with mother as well.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Just look how happy they are!
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas will tie the knot in Hindu ceremony today.
title: With Song & Dance Competition, PC-Nick Celebrate Their Sangeet In ‘Hum Saath Saath Hain’ Style
